settings.custom_liquid:
• Ultra-Compact and Travel-Friendly

• Powerful Suction

• USB Rechargeable

settings.heading: Product Description
settings.content:
Say goodbye to bulky luggage. Our Portable Vacuum Pump is the ultimate travel companion—compact, lightweight, and incredibly easy to use. Designed to remove excess air from your vacuum compression bags, it creates extra space in seconds so you can fit more without the bulk.

Whether you’re packing for a weekend getaway or an extended trip, this sleek device helps you travel efficiently, keeping your bag organized and your load lighter. Just attach, press, and watch it work its magic.

settings.heading: Product Specifications
settings.content:
Dimensions: 4.95 x 4.95 x 8.35 cm

Net Weight: 140g

Rated Power: 25W

Battery Capacity: 4440mWh

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
Processing Time: Orders ship within 1-2 business days.

Delivery Time: Estimated 7-12 business days. Refer to our shipping policy for more details.

Returns Policy: We stand by the quality of our products and want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you are not satisfied, we offer a 180-day return policy. All returned products within this time period will be inspected before a full refund is issued. Refer to our refund policy for more details.

settings.heading: One-Year Warranty
settings.content:
We stand behind the quality and durability of our products. This 1-Year Limited Warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship under normal use for one (1) year from the date of purchase.

Warranty Coverage:

  • Covers manufacturing defects in materials and craftsmanship.
  • Includes zippers, stitching, straps, and hardware that fail under normal use.

Exclusions:

This warranty does not cover:

  • Damage caused by misuse, neglect, accidents, or unauthorized modifications.
  • Normal wear and tear, including fading, scratches, or fabric deterioration over time.
  • Damage caused by improper handling, extreme conditions, or transportation mishandling.

How to Claim:

  1. Contact our customer support team with proof of purchase and a description of the issue.
  2. We will assess the claim and, if approved, offer repair, replacement, or an equivalent solution at our discretion.
  3. The customer may be responsible for shipping costs associated with warranty claims.

For any questions or to submit a claim, please reach out to us at hello@satora.store
